description: black ink and red chop marks on white; bull seen from behind at bottom, in black outline with round white center and gray horns; three lines of vertical characters at top; one red chop mark ULC, two red chop marks below line of characters at left; blue-green silk mount; black scroll bar

title: Zen Bull
